name: My University Story/我的大学物语
detailed_description:
After high school, you walk into the hall of the University and meet six girls here.

They are either smart, cheerful or cool... Every girl has a strong personal style and a story waiting to be excavated.

The content of the game includes:

. Course Selection System


At the beginning of each semester, you have a period of time to choose courses. The courses you choose will determine the next semester's class time, work and rest patterns, income and interpersonal relationships. Of course, you can also be absent from class and late and leave early, but be careful of your attendance unless you think the teacher does not call the roll this lesson!
Credits required for graduation: 120 points
Credit limit for each semester: 26 points

·Combinatorial plot

Meet different girls in different situations, and piece together the plot that belongs to you!

·After school hours

Working, learning skills, writing novels, making videos, painting, singing, dancing... You can do most of what you want to do, and they all have immeasurable benefits!

. Spiritual Directive

Don't have the courage to tell the girl you like? Too much pressure, almost collapse? Let's try the spiritual commands. It can force you to change your mood and keep it for a short time. Get out of the depression before the spiritual commands disappear.

. Community activities

Promoting clubs, launching activities, raising funds, launching competitions... Get to know like-minded friends here, eulogize youth, write miracles!

. More

There is more exciting content waiting to be excavated.
